mapper.select: select uid, uadmin, upic, exitdate from project_haru.view_board_like_user where bno = #{bno};
select u.uid, u.uadmin, u.upic, u.exitdate from project_haru.`user` as u left join project_haru.board_scrap as s on u.uid = s.uid where s.bno = #{bno} order by s.stime desc
select uid, uadmin, upic from project_haru.`user` where uid = #{uid} and upass = #{upass} and uexitdate is null
mapper.insert: insert into project_haru.`user` values(#{uid}, #{umail},#{upass}, #{upic}, #{uname}, #{ujoin}, false, now(), null)
mapper.update: update project_haru.`user` set umail = #{umail}, upass = #{upass}, upic = #{upic}, uname = #{uname} where uid = #{uid}
update project_haru.`user` set uexitdate = now() where uid = #{uid}
